channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: AT&T's budget-friendly phone for kids was designed with parental controls in mind
item.description: It might be near impossible to be a kid these days without a smartphone, but AT&T wants to offer parents a decent compromise. The wireless carrier launched its AmiGO Jr. Phone, which combines Samsung hardware and AT&T's app, to offer kids a smartphone that has parental controls baked right in. The AmiGO Jr. Phone is just a Samsung Galaxy A16, which still remains a solid budget smartphone pick with a 50-megapixel main camera, a 6.7-inch display and reliable battery life. However, AT&T tweaked the Samsung hardware into its kid-friendly smartphone by including features like live location tracking...

item.title: Crypto.com places $70M bet on AI.com domain ahead of Super Bowl
item.description: The purchase rewrites the domain record books -- not that the crypto industry has ever been accused of restraint when it comes to spending.

item.title: Countries Across Europe Take Action to Ban Social Media for Minors
item.description: At least 15 governments on the continent are planning social media bans inspired by Australia.

item.title: We Would Die for This Final ‘Project Hail Mary’ Trailer
item.description: Ryan Gosling stars in 'Project Hail Mary,' the latest film from directors Phil Lord and Chris Miller, out March 20.

item.title: The new Kirby Air Riders update is an absolute game-changer, and it took me right back to the Nintendo DS glory days
item.description: I love the new Kirby Air Riders update, especially with the inclusion of this excellent multiplayer feature.

item.title: Dans quelques heures, Sophie Adenot quittera la Terre : retrouvez-nous en live pour vivre ce moment historique
item.description: Vingt-quatre ans après le dernier vol de Claudie Haigneré, une Française s’apprête enfin à retourner dans l’espace ! Un événement à suivre en direct avec Futura, le 11 février dès 11 h.

item.title: How to watch Super Bowl 2026 halftime show — live stream Bad Bunny performance from anywhere
item.description: All the ways to watch Super Bowl 2026 halftime show live streams for FREE from anywhere, with Bad Bunny performing at the Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara.

item.title: How to stream the 2026 Super Bowl for free tonight: Patriots vs. Seahawks time, where to watch Super Bowl LX, start time, halftime show and more
item.description:
The 2026 Super Bowl between the New England Patriots and the Seattle Seahawks will air on NBC today, Feb. 8, at 6:30PM ET/3:30PM PT. The Big Game will also stream live on Peacock. If you no longer subscribe to cable, don't have access to NBC over the air and aren't currently signed up for Peacock, there are still ways to watch Super Bowl LX — and Bad Bunny's history-making Super Bowl halftime show — for free. Here's how to tune in. How to watch Super Bowl LX free:
Date: Sunday, Feb. 8 Time: 6:30 p.m. ET Location: Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, Calif. TV channel: NBC, Telemundo Streaming: ...

item.title: Okay, I’m slightly less mad about that ‘Magnificent Ambersons’ AI project
item.description: But this is still a bad idea.

item.title: We may see Apple's new iPads and MacBooks in only a matter of weeks
item.description: It's about that time. Apple is gearing up for a slew of hardware announcements that will include upgrades for the entry-level iPad, iPad Air, MacBook Pro and MacBook Air, according to Mark Gurman's Power On newsletter. In line with what we've seen in recent years, Gurman reports, "A product launch is currently slated for as early as the week of March 2."Apple unveiled the M5 MacBook Pro in October, bringing the chip first to the 14-inch model. With the coming announcements, we should see the M5 Pro and M5 Max chips finally arrive. Gurman notes that new 14-inch and 16-inch MacBook Pros are on t...

item.title: You can control your PC from almost anywhere in the world with this 5G remote KVM - and it even has a touchscreen and a HDMI port
item.description: Comet 5G combines Wi-Fi 6, 5G RedCap, touchscreen, and multi-network failover to ensure reliable remote KVM control everywhere.

item.title: Alex Ross Takes Marvel to New Dimensions in New Graphic Novel
item.description: Get ready to fall in love with Alex Ross' art all over again in the upcoming story, 'Marvel Dimensions.'

item.title: Steam now lets developers display the exact date of when their game leaves Early Access
item.description: Steam is adding a little more transparency when it comes to Early Access games. Announced in a blog post, Steam introduced a new feature for game developers to add the exact date of when their game would leave Early Access and see a version 1.0 launch. According to Steam, this feature stems from developers who requested a way to display an official launch date. While games still in Early Access give eager players a way to experience the early stages of a title and contribute towards the development, some games have been stalled in this phase for years. With this new feature, players can see a ...

item.title: Move Over, BigOven: MealBoard is my new kitchen essential
item.description: Homescreen Heroes: MealBoard has taken all the stress out of meal planning and grocery shopping

item.title: Test de l’Amazon Echo Dot Max : la petite enceinte qui voulait devenir grande
item.description: L'Echo Dot Max est la nouvelle enceinte connectée star d'Amazon. Elle vient muscler le jeu par rapport à l'Echo Dot de 2022, avec une nouvelle architecture sonore et une puce plus puissante. Ces améliorations justifient-elles un prix en hausse ?

item.title: Cette ultra-polyvalente Ugreen de 145 W supporte même la recharge sans fil pour un prix à peine supérieur à 100 euros
item.description: La Ugreen Nexode 145 W est une batterie externe compacte, mais très polyvalente grâce à ses nombreux ports de charge et son socle sans fil Qi2 qui vous permet de recharger quatre appareils en même temps. Le tout tombe à 107,97 euros chez Amazon au lieu de 179,99 euros.
